rkhrom RKHSREG_T* RKH_T::init_state

Points to initial state. The initial state must be a composite state or basic state.

Definition at line 1263 of file rkhitl.h.

char* RKH_T::name

State name string. String terminated in '\0' that represents the name of state. It generally used for debugging.

Definition at line 1256 of file rkhitl.h.

rkhuint8 RKH_T::ppty

State machine properties. The available properties are enumerated in RKH_HPPTY_T enumeration in the rkh.h file.
